item.title: APIs, the good, the bad and the ugly
item.description: Unrelated rambling Long time no blog, 2020 is the year that keeps on giving. While some people consider this to be a pretty chaotic and horrible year, I’ve been making the best of it. Learning to bake bread and other such things Learning frontend (React) Dipping my toes into GraphQL Quiting my corporate job The usual. Prologue In my past year working in the corproate world, I had to integrate with both internal and external APIs on a daily basis.
